columns.name: policy_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the IAM policy.

columns.name: is_attached
columns.description: Specifies whether the policy is attached to at least one IAM user, group, or role.

columns.name: policy_groups
columns.description: A list of IAM groups that the policy is attached to.

columns.name: policy_roles
columns.description: A list of IAM roles that the policy is attached to.

columns.name: policy_users
columns.description: A list of IAM users that the policy is attached to.
